national_motto: " Justitia – Pietas – Fides " (Latin) ++ "Justice – Piety – Trust" ++ Gerechtigheid – Vroomheid – Vertrouwen (Dutch)
national_anthem: God zij met ons Suriname (Dutch) ++ ( English: "God be with our Suriname" ) ++ ‹File: Surinamese national anthem, performed by the U.S. Navy Band.ogg›
regional_languages: 8 indigenous languages Akurio , Arawak-Lokono , Carib-Kari'nja , Sikiana-Kashuyana , Tiro-Tiriyó , Waiwai , Warao , Wayana
ethnic_groups: 27.4% Indian , 21.7% Maroon - Bushinengue , 15.7% Creole - Mulatto [^1], 13.7% Javanese , 13.4% Other Mixed (incl. Dougla s) , 3.8% Indigenous Amerindian , 1.5% Chinese [^2][^3], 1% European , 1.8% Others [^4][^5][^6]
religion: !!{{vunblist | 48.4% Christian | 22.3% Hindu | 13.9% Muslim | 1.8% Winti | 0.8% Kejawèn | 2.1% Other ++ (incl. Indigenous Amerindian beliefs , Afro-American beliefs , Jewish , Buddhist , Baháʼí ) | 7.5% None | 3.2% Not stated[^7]}}
established_event1: constituent country within the Kingdom of the Netherlands
established_event2: from the Kingdom of the Netherlands
languages: 14 languages Sranan Tongo , Sarnami Hindustani , Ndyuka , Saramaccan , Matawai , Aluku , Paramaccan , Kwinti , Javanese , Chinese , English , Portuguese , French , Spanish
